statements: DELETE FROM network_operations WHERE operation_id = 100 AND operation_type = 'classification';
DELETE FROM network_operations WHERE ai_model_id = 200 AND status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM AI_Systems WHERE id = 1 AND system_name = 'System A';
DELETE FROM Network_Operations WHERE operation_status = TRUE AND ai_system_id IN (SELECT id FROM AI_Systems WHERE managed_operations = TRUE);
DELETE FROM AI_Systems WHERE description = 'Outdated system';
DELETE FROM service_quality WHERE device_id = 3 AND model_id = 2;
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_id = 10 AND user_id = 5;
